verbs.description: jcps [ARG0: board] votes to [V: approve] [ARG1: males of color academy] [ARGM-LOC: in louisville] after more than two hours of discussion the jcps school board gave district officials the green light on tuesday night to proceed with the creation of a school geared toward black male students lexington mississippi national association for the advancement of colored people gerald neal males of color academy carter g woodson academy jcps school louisville kentucky
